Package org.mundo.xml.xquery

Provides a basic XQuery processor for content-based filtering.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
XEngine XQuery execution engine.
XQAnd logical and
XQComparisonExpr A comparison expression.
XQDocMessage A document using a message as source.
XQDoubleLiteral double literal
XQFor for loop
XQFunction function
XQLiteral base class for literals
XQLongLiteral long literal
XQNode node
XQObject Base class for all objects in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
XQOr logical or
XQPathExpr path expression
XQQuery query
XQReturn return
XQStringLiteral a string literal
XQuery Parses XQuery.
XQVar variable.
 

Exception Summary
XEngine.ExecException Indicates an error during execution of a query.
XQuery.BuildException Indicates an error during building an execution plan for a query.
XQuery.SyntaxException Indicates a syntax error while parsing the query expression.
 

Package org.mundo.xml.xquery Description

Provides a basic XQuery processor for content-based filtering.
